title: 24 Hours
body: So, for the past 2 days I have been trying to purchase RP. It keeps telling me that I am at maximum purchases of RP, and that I need to wait 24 hours every time i try. I don't know if this is a bug, or I can't add any RP anymore, but I wanna see if I can get any help on this.

replies.body: Ahhhhh you're going to need to wait that *full 24 hours* before attempting to purchase again. If the store detects too many failed attempts at entering the card, it'll lock you out in case someone has hacked your account. If you make any attempts before the 24 hours have passed, then it resets the counter.
So I waited a full 24 hours and an extra hour since the store was down. It continues to say I must wait 24 hours. So I'm still a bit confused.

Hmmm that's odd if you've waited a full 24 hours and it's still saying that. Reach out to our billing team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they should be able to get everything straightened out for you!
Alright thanks, I'll try for probably another 24 hours to see it'll work. If that doesn't work then ye I'll head to a support ticket.
Juuuuuust to be safe, I'd try waiting around 30 hours to make sure enough time has passed.
By the way, just so you know. I waited almost 48 hours and it works again.
yeah that was pretty much what i was thinking, and yeah thanks for all the help.

Hello i have the same problem, i've been having this message for 4 days now.. i really want to open some project capsules but riot don't let me.. 

Pls fix this problem!
You can always gift yourself the stuff you want to buy with the RP from another account :)
